mapper.select: SELECT EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MGR_TYPE AS mgrType /* 운영자 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MGR_NM AS mgrNm /* 운영자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.PASSWD AS passwd /* 비밀번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_MGR.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MGR.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MGR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_MGR_PK(P),SYS_C0011479(C) */ AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_CLIENT_INFO_EZC_MGR(R) */ AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_PARTNER_EZC_MGR(R) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_TYPE = #{mgrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_NM = #{mgrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.PASSWD = #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 비밀번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_MGR.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MGR.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MGR_TYPE AS mgrType /* 운영자 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MGR_NM AS mgrNm /* 운영자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.PASSWD AS passwd /* 비밀번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_MGR.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_MGR.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_MGR.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_TYPE = #{mgrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MGR_NM = #{mgrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.PASSWD = #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 비밀번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_MGR.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_MGR.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_MGR.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_MGR.MGR_ID DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_MGR SET /* 운영자 정보 */ MGR_TYPE = #{mgrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MGR_NM = #{mgrNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,PASSWD = #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 비밀번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
